attributes.action: Offer breast screening checks to all women at all ages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the NHS only offer screening to women aged 50-70. Breast cancer can attack at any age. I know of three people who had breast cancer outside the age group that the NHS screen and all three of them didnt't survive and probably still be alive today if they received screening.

rejection.details:
A similar petition already exists on this subject. Please see:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/mammogram/

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
